beer.name: Woodcut No.2
beer.description: Aged in virgin oak barrels, Woodcut No.2 is definitely a cut above. The color is a rich golden copper. Soft tannins complement the toffee-like malt character. And the aromas are reminiscent of fresh woodshop shavings and vanilla bean -- an irresistible combination. Each Woodcut offering is a truly lmited-edition beer made with select hops, fine malted barley and our brewers' careful aging process.
